member.name: T:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract
member.summary: Temporary datatables allow the user to enter data for the quantity adjustments, serial numbers selected and serial number formats.

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.CheckSN(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Determines if serial numbers are required for this transaction

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetInventoryQtyAdj(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the default values for the InventoryQtyAdj data table based on the part number entered.
member.param: UOM Code (only used for Product Codes)

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetInventoryQtyAdjBrwInclManaged(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the default values for the browse section of the adjustment screen (including SMI inventory)
member.param: Warehouse code used to get bin information.
member.returns: Browse for inventory qty adj data set

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetInventoryQtyAdjBrw(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the default values for the browse section of the adjustment screen (excluding SMI inventory)
member.param: Warehouse code used to get bin information.
member.returns: Browse for inventory qty adj data set

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetPartXRefInfo(System.String@,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: This method defaults PartAdvisor fields when the PartNum field changes
member.param: RowID of the selected record. Skips find part logic if this has a value.
RowType of the selected record. Only used with sysRowID.
UOM Code (only used for Product Codes)
Warning message if the InvTransfer line contains serial numbers
If the part is being changed to something different than what was on the order, ask if the user wants to continue
Multiple matches were found by FindPart

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetSelectSerialNumbersParams(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.String,System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets parameters required for launching Select Serial Numbers

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.KitPartStatus(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Checks Part's type and returns warning message if the part is a Sales Kit.
member.param: Message to warn that Kits shouldn't have stock quantities.

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.PreSetInventoryQtyAdj(Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjTableset@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: This method will return a record in the LegalNumGenOpts datatable if a legal number is required for this transaction. The RequiresUserInput flag will indicate if this legal number requires input from the user. If it does, the LegalNumberPrompt business objects needs to be called to gather that information. This method should be called when the user saves the record but before the Update method is called.
member.param: Indicates if the legal number requires user input

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.SetInventoryQtyAdj(Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjTableset@,System.String@)
member.summary: Create Part Tran records from the Inventory QtyAdj dataset. If Serial numbers are entered, SerialNo records and SNTran records are created. If the Serial number format is changed, the Part table will be updated with the information provided in the SNFormat data table.

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.ValidateSN(Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjTableset@,System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Validates that a single serial number is valid for this transaction

member.name: M:Erp.Contracts.InventoryQtyAdjSvcContract.GetAvailTranDocTypes(System.String@)
member.summary: Method to call to get available tran doc types.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SelectedSerialNumbersRow.KBLbrAction
member.summary: Action type field used for Kanban receipts to indicate if the new serial number status is Inventory, Scrapped or NonConf. This requires Code/desc: 1 ` inventory 2 ` Scrapped 3 ` Nonconformance

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SelectedSerialNumbersRow.KBLbrActionDesc
member.summary: Description field for KBLbrAction ? holds the translated description for the KBLbrAction code for UI display and combo box.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SelectedSerialNumbersRow.PreventDeselect
member.summary: If true, then users can not deselect this serial number. This is used by applications that allow maintenance to the Selected Serial Numbers after update.

member.summary: Used only by SN Assignment

member.summary: The mask the was used to generate the serial number

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SelectedSerialNumbersRow.NotSavedToDB
member.summary: Flag to indicate that the SelectedSerialNumbers entry has not yet been saved to the DB for the related transaction. Used to keep track of which deselected serial numbers need to be passed to the transaction update logic.

member.summary: Company Identifier.

member.summary: Site Identifier. This field cannot be blank.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.PartNum
member.summary: The PartNum field identifies the Part and is used in the primary key.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.NumberOfDigits
member.summary: Number of digits in the serial number

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNMask
member.summary: If the SNBaseDataType is Mask this is the Serial Mask ID assigned for format validation/generation.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNBaseDataType
member.summary: Current setting for Data type of the Base Serial Number field to be used as new serial numbers are generated. Valid values; Character, Integer, Mask Code/desc required: CHARACTER`Alphanumeric INTEGER`NumericOnly MASK`Serial Mask This field should be flagged as Include = true in Object Designer.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNFormat
member.summary: Current setting for Format of the Base serial number that will be used as new serial numbers are generated. Expressed in progress syntax. Ex: X(30), 99999999 for Character or Integer, or as a Serial Mask defined in SerialMask table. This field should be flagged as ReadOnly and Include = true in Object Designer.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.LeadingZeroes
member.summary: Whether or not to have leading zeroes

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNPrefix
member.summary: Current setting for the prefix that will be attached to all new Serial Numbers as they are generated for Character and Integer format types. This field should be flagged as Include = true in Object Designer.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNMaskSuffix
member.summary: A standard suffix that will be attached to all serial numbers generated for the PartSite currently used only by SNBaseStructure Mask types

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNMaskPrefix
member.summary: The prefix that was used to construct the serial number currently used only by SNBaseStructure Mask types

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.SNFormatRow.SNLastUsedSeq
member.summary: This is the last used serial sequence. It is used only for the Mask Generate type to determine the next logical serial number to generate for this part/Site. It can be altered by the user and several PartSites can have the same counter values defined, but

member.summary: Reason code required flag

member.summary: Determines if inventory level can be driven below zero.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.EnableSN
member.summary: True/False flag that determines if serial numbers are required for this transaction.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.OnHandUOM
member.summary: Unit of Measure that qualifies the OnHandQty.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartTrackSerialNum
member.summary: Indicates if this part is serial number tracked

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartSellingFactor
member.summary:
This value is used to convert quantity when there is a difference in the customers unit of measure and how it is stocked in inventory. Example is sold in pounds, stocked in sheets.
Formula: Inventory Qty * Conversion Factor = Selling Qty.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartPricePerCode
member.summary: Indicates the pricing per quantity for this part. It can be "E" = per each, "C" = per hundred, "M" = per thousand. Maintainable only via Part Maintenance. The initial default is "E". Used as default PricePerCode in order entry and invoice entry.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartTrackDimension
member.summary: Onhand quantity is always tracked in the Parts primary inventory uom (Part.IUM). Checking this box indicates that you want to allow tracking of onhand quantity by additional uoms. The actual UOMs to be tracked for the part are indicated by PartUOM.TrackOnHand. In order to set the PartUOM.TrackOhHand = True the Part.TrackDimension must = true. This replaces the old 8.3 Track Dimension feature

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartIUM
member.summary: Primary Inventory Unit of Measure. The unit costs, are based on this uom. Used as a default for issue transactions for the part. Part onhand and allocation quantities are tracked by this uom. The quantities can also be tracked by other uoms (see PartUOM table) but tracking at this uom is mandatory. Use UOMClass.DefUOMCode of the system default UOMClass when creating new part records (see XASyst.DefUOMClassID).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartSalesUM
member.summary: The Selling Unit of measure for the Part. The UOM which the unit prices are based on. Defaults as the Part.IUM.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartTrackLots
member.summary: Indicates if Lot numbers are prompted for in transactions for this part. Backflushing and AutoReceiving functions are ignored when TrackLots = Yes.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.PartPartDescription
member.summary: Describes the Part.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.ReasonCodeDescription
member.summary: Full description of Reason... used on displays/reports.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.WareHseDescription
member.summary: Description.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.InventoryQtyAdjListRow.WhseBinDescription
member.summary: This field can be used to describe the physical location, dimensions or other attributes of the warehouse bin. It possibly could even be used to record a "Heat" number for an item. The description is optional and can be left blank.
